title: El secreto de sus ojos
overview: A retired legal counselor writes a novel hoping to find closure for one of his past unresolved homicide cases and for his unreciprocated love with his superior - both of which still haunt him decades later.

title: Hable con ella
overview: Two men share an odd friendship while they care for two women who are both in deep comas.

title: Atonement
overview: Thirteen-year-old fledgling writer Briony Tallis irrevocably changes the course of several lives when she accuses her older sister's lover of a crime he did not commit.

title: Portrait de la jeune fille en feu
overview: On an isolated island in Brittany at the end of the eighteenth century, a female painter is obliged to paint a wedding portrait of a young woman.

title: Trois couleurs: Rouge
overview: A model discovers a retired judge is keen on invading people's privacy.

title: Darbareye Elly
overview: The mysterious disappearance of a kindergarten teacher during a picnic in the north of Iran is followed by a series of misadventures for her fellow travelers.

title: Rebecca
overview: A self-conscious woman juggles adjusting to her new role as an aristocrat's wife and avoiding being intimidated by his first wife's spectral presence.

title: Forrest Gump
overview: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

title: Belle de jour
overview: A frigid young housewife decides to spend her midweek afternoons as a prostitute.

title: Hiroshima mon amour
overview: A French actress filming an anti-war film in Hiroshima has an affair with a married Japanese architect as they share their differing perspectives on war.

title: Dà hóng denglong gaogao guà
overview: A young woman becomes the fourth wife of a wealthy lord, and must learn to live with the strict rules and tensions within the household.

title: Jules et Jim
overview: Decades of a love triangle concerning two friends and an impulsive woman.

title: Le passé
overview: An Iranian man deserts his French wife and her two children to return to his homeland. Meanwhile, his wife starts up a new relationship, a reality her husband confronts upon his wife's request for a divorce.

title: Gully Boy
overview: A coming-of-age story based on the lives of street rappers in Mumbai.

title: Gegen die Wand
overview: With the intention to break free from the strict familial restrictions, a suicidal young woman sets up a marriage of convenience with a forty-year-old addict, an act that will lead to an outburst of envious love.

title: Doctor Zhivago
overview: The life of a Russian physician and poet who, although married to another, falls in love with a political activist's wife and experiences hardship during World War I and then the October Revolution.

title: Apocalypse Now
overview: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.

title: Brief Encounter
overview: Meeting a stranger in a railway station, a woman is tempted to cheat on her husband.

title: Gilda
overview: A small-time gambler hired to work in a Buenos Aires casino discovers his employer's new wife is his former lover.

title: Citizen Kane
overview: Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance; 'Rosebud'.
